title: LeaverBuster
body: Hi, i've got LeaverBuster, because my client crashed 2 times in a row, and can not recconect until the end (about 5-6 minutes). Can you guys off my leaverbuster??? :(

replies.body: Same i can't join a single game i can only play custom, all because i was trying to get league of legends on a different PC and it kept crashing.

Leaverbuster can occur from multiple leaves, and the only way to get it off is by resolving whatever is causing you to have interruptions.  These leaves cause negative experiences for other players, so it's important to get this resolved!  If you are having trouble staying connect, our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can help you out!  Let me know if you have any questions.

Typical Riot answer. My game always gives me this "corrupt file" bs, and has to rescan. Next thing I get a leaverbuster. Maybe you should fix the game issues. Also, the /remake should be 5 mins, not 3 or whatever it is now, because on average it takes about 5 mins for the damn client to rescan the files. How is that even fair? Not much can happen in 5 minutes. Why punish people for 5 minutes?

Do you guys have another message to copy and paste? That's exactly the same message your terrible customer support pasted as an answer to my ticket, without even reading my message. Your game has a bug, go read the other threads. It is not our fault when the game crash because of you and we lose points plus we get disrespected when we contact the customer support. My ticket was closed and my issue was not even resolved.
AND WE CAN NOT EVEN SPEAK TO A MANAGER? WHAT KIND OF CUSTOMER SUPPORT IS THIS?
Was the crash in or after the champion select?

I have a question for you guys. I have had internet issues that I have now hopefully resolved both in my old apartment and now my new place.  I got leaver buster for 20  minutes.  Why is it that after waiting for 20 minutes I cannot invite other players to join my team? I've already served a penalty, why do they have to get punished as well? As a result I now served 3 20 minute sessions for 1 leaver buster game. In total I will have served a penalty of 8 games. How is that fair at all?
